sentence:
Mr. THOMPSON of Pennsylvania. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize  Jim Decker as he retires from the Warren County Chamber of Business and  Industry.

Jim's professional life is deeply intertwined with the economic  vitality of Warren County, Pennsylvania. Since 1989, he has served…

Mr. KEAN. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize the Land of Make  Believe in Hope Township, Warren County the ``World's Greatest  Amusement Park,'' the ``Most Iconic Amusement Park in New Jersey'' and  the ``Number One Amusement Park in New Jersey.''

The Land of Make Believe…

…Mystic. Serving as the only triage coordinator on the scene, he played  a critical role in one of the largest rescue efforts in recent Coast  Guard history.

Scott grew up in Warren County, attended Rider University, and  answered the call to serve by enlisting in the U.S. Coast Guard, where  he trained as a rescue swimmer before deploying into action with…
